document.full_text: china has effectively ruled out dialogue with the tibetan government-in-exile's new prime minister, saying it will only meet with representatives of the dalai lama and will limit any talks to the tibetan spiritual leader's future.
document.title: china effectively rules out talks with new exiled tibet pm
lines_and_colors: china has effectively ruled out dialogue with the tibetan government-in-exile's new prime minister, saying it will only meet with representatives of the dalai lama and will limit any talks to the tibetan spiritual leader's future.
